lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Afternoon, Clerk.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Officer Beige. Back so soon? To what do I owe the visit? I thought the research was concluded?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Can’t I just come to visit the nearest Kiosk shop, why the prejudice?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: No, I am sorry if I sound annoyed, I was just surprised. Most people just go to the big stores like HyperMart.

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Their mistake.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Could I have your ID card as usual, cannot make exceptions…

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Very well…of course

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Good job clerk. Always by the book. And now for your information the investigation is never truly done. There is always someone to catch down the line…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: So you were here for the research!

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: You have to calm down, clerk. Without being guilty it wont be a problem anyway right?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Of course not…but it is just…

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text:
It is interesting. I have found that there have been many irregularities and all point to your small Kiosk shop.
Very curious right?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: This is the wrong question to ask clerk. You are not worried who is the source of information, you are worried about the discovery of your compliance

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Come on man, don't twist things, just an innocent question. I am trying to get to the bottom of things, like you

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: I know about your connection with the Shady figure named Shaun Bakers. Or at least that is one of the ways he is known as.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ho...What? I don't know him

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: The mask fell off very quickly, cashier. I wanted to assess for myself if the information was correct and if you would confess. Thank you for your valuable cooperation on the investigation. You made my job much easier.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: No…no wait there is misunderstanding

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: I will stop you spilling more lies…you are arrested!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Fuck

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: What? OK, tell me everything you know

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yes I did it..I gave information to the shady guy, got a lot of it for money.

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: You confess pretty early, that is surprising, continue.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yes I did a stupid thing no point in hiding it anymore, I am sorry for what I have done. I really needed money but that was just wrong…

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text:
Well your sorriness cannot make up for  your wrong doings
But I can give you another option…

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Work with me kid, lets bring him down together

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text:
If you are able to that, maybe there is way out, and you will prove that you deserve a second chance, but I cannot promise
This is the best I can offer

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I understand I did something really bad, I want to correct my mistakes, I will work with you and help you anyway I can to bring the shady guy down!

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: We have a lot of work to do

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Well done kid, that was the right answer.
